item.title: Honey Drippers - Sea Of Love
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8650

Do you remember
when we met
That’s the day
I knew you were my pet
I want to tell you
how much I love you
Come with me my love
to the sea
The sea of love
I want to tell you
Just how much
I love you
Come with me
to the sea

when we met
That’s the day
I knew you were my pet
I want to tell you
how much I love you-

to the sea
